S

send(Object) - Method in class io.deepstream.RpcRequest
Completes the request by sending the response data to the server.
set(Object) - Method in class io.deepstream.AnonymousRecord
Proxies to the actualRecord.set(Object) method.
set(String, Object) - Method in class io.deepstream.AnonymousRecord
Proxies to the actualRecord.set(String, Object) method.
set(Object) - Method in class io.deepstream.Record
Set the value for the entire record
Make sure that the Object passed in can be serialised to a JsonElement, otherwise it will throw a IllegalStateException.
set(String, Object) - Method in class io.deepstream.Record
Set the value for a specific path in your Record data.
Make sure that the Object passed in can be serialised to a JsonElement, otherwise it will throw a IllegalStateException.
The best way to guarantee this is by setting Json friendly objects, such as Map.
If you path is not null, you can pass in primitives as long as the path is not null, which is the equivalent of calling Record.set(Object).
setEntries(List<String>) - Method in class io.deepstream.List
Updates the list with a new set of entries
setMergeStrategy(MergeStrategy) - Method in class io.deepstream.Record
Set a merge strategy that comes with deepstream.
setMergeStrategy(RecordMergeStrategy) - Method in class io.deepstream.Record
Set a custom merge strategy for this record
setName(String) - Method in class io.deepstream.AnonymousRecord
Sets the underlying record the anonymous record is bound to.
setRuntimeErrorHandler(DeepstreamRuntimeErrorHandler) - Method in class io.deepstream.DeepstreamClient
Adds a DeepstreamRuntimeErrorHandler that will catch all RuntimeErrors such as AckTimeouts and allow the user to gracefully handle them.
snapshot(String) - Method in class io.deepstream.RecordHandler
Retrieve the current record data without subscribing to changes
If the record does not exist an error will be thrown
subscribe(RecordChangedCallback) - Method in class io.deepstream.AnonymousRecord
 
subscribe(String, RecordChangedCallback) - Method in class io.deepstream.AnonymousRecord
Proxies the actual Record.subscribe(java.lang.String, io.deepstream.RecordChangedCallback) method.
subscribe(String, EventListener) - Method in class io.deepstream.EventHandler
 
subscribe(ListChangedListener) - Method in class io.deepstream.List
Notifies the user whenever the list has changed
subscribe(ListChangedListener, boolean) - Method in class io.deepstream.List
Notifies the user whenever the list has changed, and notifies immediately if triggerNow is true
subscribe(String, RecordChangedCallback) - Method in class io.deepstream.Record
Notifies the user whenever anything under the path provided has changed.
subscribe(RecordChangedCallback) - Method in class io.deepstream.Record
Notifies the user whenever anything inside the Record has changed.
subscribe(RecordChangedCallback, boolean) - Method in class io.deepstream.Record
Notifies the user whenever anything inside the Record has changed, and triggers the listener immediately.
subscribe(String, RecordChangedCallback, boolean) - Method in class io.deepstream.Record
Subscribe to record changes.
If a path is provided, updates will be based on everything in or under it.
If trigger now is true, the listener will be immediately fired with the current value.
success() - Method in class io.deepstream.RpcResponse
Whether or not the RPC completed
